question: Hello Everyone,Last may 19, 2015 i had exposure with blood, last november 18 2015, blood drawn and all test are negative Hepatitis B & C , HIVI have a diabetes and i would like to ask if diabetes can affect my hepatitis test and HIV TestDo i need another test or my 6 month negative test result is enough?
title: HIV 6 Months Negative Result
